DELETE /accounts/{account_id}/devices/de.description: Delete a Device DEX test. Returns the remaining device dex tests for the account.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

data.description: The configuration object which contains the details for the WARP client to conduct the test.

description.example: Checks the dash endpoint every 30 minutes

enabled.description: Determines whether or not the test is active.

interval.description: How often the test will run.

name.description: The name of the DEX test. Must be unique.

target_policies.description: Device settings profiles targeted by this test

default.description: Whether the profile is the account default

id.description: The id of the device settings profile

name.description: The name of the device settings profile

test_id.description: The unique identifier for the test.
